department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Oxygen and Life
course.faculty_text: Andrew H. Knoll and Peter R. Girguis
course.description: In this seminar, we will explore the molecular and physiological interactions between organisms and oxygen, and use these to shed light on the role of oxygen in modulating evolutionary change through Earth history.
course.prerequisites: One of the following: OEB 191, EPS 181, EPS 186; or permission of instructors
